13b3ea5c-633c-4d8f-bd05-29d459b77ccd.description: The NA4SA Academy is a structured professional development program for activity advisors/professionals. Foundations for Advisors is specifically designed for first or second year advisors. A two-hour introductory session is a part of the National Activity Advisor Clinic. Eight additional monthly segments feature monographs, veteran advisor-produced videos, virtual facilitated meetings/check-ins and reflective writing. The program includes 14 hours of virtual engagement with other advisors.

issuer.summary: issued by National Association for Student Activities

badge_template_activities.title: Program content is organized into nine segments that are located on a virtual learning platform. All program writings and videos are accessible on the platform to allow for asynchronous virtual progress through the program. Participants are expected to read/view all of the components housed on the platform. The monthly meeting/check-ins are recorded. In-person participation in at least 75% of these sessions is expected.
